overview: Beyonce Knowles is without a doubt one of the biggest pop stars the world has ever seen. Her powerful female image has inspired millions all around the globe and her lyrics have helped spread the message of solidarity, independence and positivity. From Destinyâ€™s Child to record breaking solo act and worldwide tour with husband Jay-Z. Follow Beyonce's journey to how she got on top!
tagline: Beyonce Knowles is without a doubt one of the biggest pop stars the world has ever seen. She recently embarked on a tour with husband Jay-Z- follow her journey to how she got on top!
title: Beyonce: On Top
